DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare pharmacokinetics two Traclear 62.5 mg tablet one HGP1206 125 mg tablet healthy male volunteer .
DOC.brief_title: To Compare Pharmacokinetics Traclear 62.5 mg Tablets HGP1206 125mg 1 Tablet Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: An Open-label , Randomized , Single-dose , 2-way Crossover Study Compare Pharmacokinetics safety Traclear 62.5 mg Tablets HGP1206 125mg Tablet Healthy Male Volunteers .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male Age 20 55 Signed inform consent Has history Primary pulmonary hypertension investigational product ingredient Hypotension hypertension
